previous_headings: FoRmd: Form templates with Rmarkdown > Usage
title: Reusable Rmarkdown form templates and utils
text: (Requires rmarkdown >= 2.14) see available templates:rmarkdown::available_templates(package = "formd") import templates “standard” DSP document: formd::draftStandardDSP(version = "v1") (, older version specified, specified default current version) creates folder ‘DSP_Standard_v1’ current working directory, contains bundle docs DSP. Drafting DSP manner like ordering prix fixe menu. can change parameters main document, .e. DSP_Standard_v*.Rmd. Generally, customize template fit needs project: Change parameters fundingAgency reference actual project funding agency main document. Tweak wording needed child template docs. Remove add form inputs child template; *_config.yml file defines inputs inputs template. Forms modularized can hosted separate web pages concatenated single web page. , describes make DSP form prix fixe way, may alternatively wish build DSP form la carte. example, may want import one component template, DSP_Core, write totally different custom sections, compose final DSP_Main document. case, just import using rmarkdown::draft("DSP_Core", template = "DSP_Core", package = "formd") draft working directory (use RStudio UI ).

title: Reconstruct radio button inputs — fromRadioButtonInput
text: Radio button inputs two inputs "Yes" "", e.g. Input_1_Y Input_1_N, tied Input_1. Since data returned Input_1 either "Y""" value, reconstruct "Input_1_*" taking value present Input_1. "Y", "Input_1_Y" constructed, "Input_1_N" otherwise.
